column2: You have lived a long life in Middle-earth, but you can no longer linger, you feel it, the time approaches for the heirs to rise and replace you.
A feeling of yearning grows deep in you. Your time in Middle-earth comes to a close, you must return to the West.
You wake finding yourself in bed. Though darkness surrounds you, you see a bright light grow in the distance. Warmth fills you as it approaches.
A Lesser Ring has been uncovered by [From.GetFirstName].
